about_the_game:
Welcome to Mechanic Supermarket Simulator!

Dive into the high-octane world of automotive retail where you’re not just a mechanic but the visionary owner of an auto parts empire. Start with a humble store and transform it into a regional powerhouse, becoming the go-to destination for car enthusiasts, mechanics, and everyday drivers alike.

Build Your Dream Auto Oasis
Create a retail space where every car lover feels at home. Design and customize your store layout, stock shelves with everything from essential maintenance supplies to high-performance upgrades, and make strategic choices to keep shelves full without overstocking. Your goal? Become the ultimate inventory guru by understanding customer demand and optimizing stock levels.

Expand Your Automotive Empire
Watch your small-town parts store grow as you attract a loyal customer base. Expand your reach, open new locations, and build a network of stores that cater to all automotive needs. With each new success, you’ll unlock new opportunities and scale your business into a well-recognized automotive brand.

Unlock New Parts & Licenses
Keep your business on the cutting edge by securing exclusive licenses for the latest automotive parts and technology. Offer everything from eco-friendly hybrid components to the newest in autonomous driving systems, staying ahead of competitors and making your store the industry standard for quality and innovation.

Master the Marketplace
Use your business instincts to adapt pricing, respond to customer trends, and outmaneuver the competition. With dynamic market challenges and seasonal shifts in demand, every decision counts. Prioritize customer satisfaction by providing top-notch service and specialized expertise for every kind of car owner.

Mechanic Supermarket Simulator combines the thrill of retail strategy with the world of automotive innovation. Whether you’re fine-tuning prices, stocking cutting-edge tech, or expanding your brand, every choice drives you closer to becoming the ultimate automotive retail titan. Are you ready to rev up and make your mark?
